title: Easton announces Supertuck Fine Fund to help you pay those pesky fines from UCI
content:
Recently, the UCI announced that they would be cracking down on the aerodynamic position known as the Supertuck. Apparently, the position has been deemed just too dangerous for competition, and the UCI has banned the use of the supertuck in racing. Complete with fine of up to a 1,000 CHF (~$1,070 USD) and docking riders […]

The post Easton announces Supertuck Fine Fund to help you pay those pesky fines from UCI appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
